title: Nursing Value Education Design: Simulation-Based Interactive Discussion

context.prior_knowledge: Basic Nursing Theory and Clinical Practice Experience
context.additional_context: A structured course for pre-service nurses to systematically acquire professional values, utilizing smartphone-based VR content in limited technological environments

learning_goals: Learners can apply professional ethics codes (e.g., respect for life, protection of patient rights) with over 80% accuracy through simulation scenarios.
Students can propose rational solutions to conflicts in nursing values (e.g., patient autonomy vs. caregiver demands) in interactive discussions

In VR-based assessments, students achieve at least the 'developing' level (out of three tiers: basic-developing-proficient) in measuring value-based communication skills during team-based decision-making processes

constraints.tech_requirements: Limited tech environment (no PC, smartphone only)

difficulty: Hard - Complex requirements with multiple constraints
